thread.title: WATCH: LeBron James Hits Incredible Last Second Three Pointer
thread.title_full: WATCH: LeBron James Hits Incredible Last Second Three Pointer

title: WATCH: LeBron James Hits Incredible Last Second Three Pointer
text:
WATCH: LeBron James Hits Incredible Last Second Three Pointer Tue Feb 07 2017 21:49:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) Tue Feb 07 2017 21:49:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) Ryan Sidle Ryan Sidle in other 
If you've got the nickname "King James" then you've got to pull off some royally good moments and there might not be many better than LeBron James last second three pointer. 
The three time NBA champion returned home to the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2015 and last year he helped them win their first ever championships. 
Last night the Cavs faced off against the Washington Wizards. A free throw in the last second for the Wizards made the score 117-120. 
With literally three seconds left the ball was launched forward to King James and the 32 year old sunk an incredible three pointer with less than a second left to tie the game. This is an UNBELIEVABLE shot @KingJames ! pic.twitter.com/5JW63i7U33 - NBA UK (@NBAUK) February 7, 2017 
Before last night the legendary small forward had only sunk one of his previous 17 attempts at game tying three point shots in the last five seconds of a match. 
The Cavs went on to win 140-135 and had James to thank for their success despite the fact that the four time NBA MVP didn't finish the game after his five personal fouls. 
It was some moment for an incredible player! Sponsored Links
